name: After Skool Hobby
description: Singapore-based parody Pokémon cards. Many popular cards are reimagined in a cute, simplified style, such as the "Poncho-wearing Pikachu" and "Latias & Latios GX.". Individual packs and bundles are sold via the official Etsy store.

name: Disgruntled Games
description: Ohio-based tattoo shop known for creating the first MetaZoo parody cards. Originally a collaboration between Disgruntled Games LLC and Black Border Society, the latter moved on to make their own satirical "Brainwash TCG." The series pokes fun at the controversial industry practices happening at the time (and still happen today).

name: MetaZoo
description: Cryptid-themed tcg launched in 2020 via Kickstarter by Michael Waddell. The game featured "Beasties" inspired by folklore creatures like Mothman and Bigfoot, with unique "4th Wall" mechanics that let real-world conditions affect gameplay. After rapid growth and partnerships with Steve Aoki and Sanrio, MetaZoo Games abruptly shut down in January 2024 and filed for bankruptcy.

name: OpenZoo
description: A community-driven fan project creating original cards in the MetaZoo style. Born from the ashes of Mothman and Bigfoot, OpenZoo produces cards compatible with MetaZoo (the good one), keeping the true spirit of the game alive after the company's closure.

name: WrennyMoo
description: Parody card series featuring distinctive "Derpy" illustrations of popular Pokémon. Created by Alex Roh before disappearing from the internet, the packs were sold on a mysterious Etsy store. The series has become a cult collector's item since being discontinued.
